weight: Approx. 113g / 3.9oz. (including battery and memory card) Approx. 97g / 3.4oz. (excluding battery and memory card)
exposurecompensation: -2 EV to +2 EV in increments of 1/3 EV
flashmode: Face detection OFF Auto, Forced Flash, Suppressed Flash, Slow Synchro. Face detection ON Red-eye Reduction Auto, Red-eye Reduction & Forced Flash, Suppressed Flash, Red-eye Reduction & Slow Synchro.
playback: Face Detection, Photobook assist, Image search, Erase selected frames, Slide show, Protect, Crop, Resize, Image rotate, Mark for upload, Multi-frame playback (with Microthumbnail), Motion Panorama, Favorite, Movie edit
aperture: F3.5 / F8.0(Wide) F6.3 / F15.0 (Telephoto) with ND filter
movierecording: 1280 x 720pixels / 640 x 480pixels / 320 x 240pixels (30fps) with monaural sound. Zoom function can be used.
flashrange: Normal Wide : approx. 50cm - 6.3m / 1.6ft. - 20.6ft. Telephoto : approx. 90cm - 3.5m / 2.9ft. - 11.4ft. Macro Wide : approx. 30cm - 80cm / 0.9ft. - 2.6 ft. Telephoto : approx. 80cm - 1.2m / 2.6ft. - 3.9ft.
focallength: f=4.6mm - 23mm, equivalent to 26 - 130mm on a 35mm format
focusmodes: Single AF / Continuous AF (SR AUTO, Movie)
normalfocusrange: Wide : approx. 50cm to infinity / 1.6ft. to infinity Telephoto: approx. 90cm to infinity / 2.9ft. to infinity
shootingmodes: SR AUTO, AUTO, Program, Natural Light & with Flash, Natural Light, Portrait, Baby, Smile, Landscape, Panorama, Sport, Night, Night (Tripod), Fireworks, Sunset, Snow, Beach, Party, Flower, Text, Advanced Filter, Individual shutter 3D
digitalzoom: Approx. 6.7x (up to approx. 33.5x, with 5x optical zoom)
